task.finnish: Kysy pöytäseurueeltasi, mitkä ovat heidän lempipokemoninsa
task.english: Ask the people at your table what their favourite pokémon are
Tell a female that you think her arm pits are amazing
Push past someone when you are in a line
Give two different people compliments on their outfits
Predict someone's future by reading their palm
Try to get the person next to you to say "Einstein"
Tell someone that you came here by boat
Compliment a bestman's beard

task.finnish: Ota selfie valokuvaajan kanssa ja lisää se WedBoxiin
task.english: Take a selfie with the photographer and add it to WedBox
High five with the bride
Tell a bestman that "You're open up front"
Challenge someone to a game of rock-paper-scissors
Talk about your drink you were an expert
Tell the groom the best memory you have of him
Claim to your table that you invented post-it notes

task.finnish: Harmittele vierustoverillesi, kun et saanut ottaa koiraa mukaan häihin
task.english: Tell the person next to you how sad you are since you couldn't bring your dog to the wedding

task.finnish: Varasta kaason kenkä ja lopulta palauta se
task.english: Steal a shoe from a bridesmaid, then return it later

task.finnish: Tarjoudu ehostamaan jonkun kampausta, ja tee se
task.english: Offer to improve someone's hair, and do so
Tell someone that you came by helicopter

task.finnish: Väitä pöydässä kovaan ääneen, että maapallo on litteä
task.english: While at your table, claim very loudly that the Earth is flat
Wonder out loud to yourself who came up with love
Pretend to be a statue for a minute

task.finnish: Yllytä lähelläsi olevia "Jos sul' lysti on" -lauluun
task.english: Get people close to you to sing "If you're happy and you know it"

task.finnish: Kysy kahdelta vieraalta, mitä mieltä he ovat uudesta hatustasi (vaikkei sinulla oleh hattua)
task.english: Ask two different guests what they think of your new hat (when not wearing a hat)
Start a conversation in Swedish
Tell the bride and groom a marriage-related joke

task.finnish: Haasta sulhasen sisko tai veli kivi-paperi-sakset -peliin
task.english: Challenge the groom's brother or sister to a game of rock-paper-scissors

task.finnish: Ota selfie sulhasen kanssa ja lisää se WedBoxiin
task.english: Take a selfie with the groom and add it to WedBox
Compliment a person sitting next to you
Do the macarena

task.finnish: Kysy vieruskaveriltasi, saatko maistaa hänen ruokaansa tai juomaansa
task.english: Ask the person sitting next to you if you can try their food or drink
Start a conversation in Finnish
Offer to give your autograph to one of the guests

task.finnish: Esittele itsesi kolme kertaa samalle henkilölle lyhyen ajan sisällä
task.english: Introduce yourself to the same person three times within a short time
Mutter in frustration to yourself so that those at your table can hear it
Compliment a person next to you with great exaggeration

task.finnish: Mene kehumaan jotakuta toisessa pöydässä istuvaa
task.english: Go and compliment someone that is sitting in a different table

task.finnish: Tanssi hetki käyttäen isoja ja näyttäviä liikkeitä
task.english: Dance for a moment using big and showy moves
Whisper your name to three different wedding guests
Compliment two different people for their outfits

task.finnish: Kysy joltain vieraalta saatko silittää hänen päätään
task.english: Ask one of the guests if you can stroke the top of their head
Ask one of the guests to massage your shoulders
Massage a guest's shoulders (with their permission)

task.finnish: Kun sinulta kysytään jotain, leiki ettet kuula ja toista kolmesti "Mitä?"
task.english: When someone asks something from you, pretend you didn't hear and repeat "What?" three times

task.finnish: Kun sinulta kysytään jotain, vastaa kysymykseen kysymyksellä
task.english: When someone asks something from you, answer the question with another question
Ask a bestman for tips on growing a beard
Use your napkin as a bib (cloth hanging from the neck to protect from spilled food)
Make funny faces at the person sitting in front of you
Whistle at a guest as they walk by

task.finnish: Kysy onko kenelläkään purkkaa, ja jos sitä tarjotaan, kieltäydy
task.english: Ask if anyone has gum an, if offered some, say you don't want any
Ask someone what their top five pokémon are

task.finnish: Esittele jollekin vieraalle keksimääsi uutta kävelytyyliä
task.english: Show one of the guests a new way of walking that you came up with

task.finnish: Kerro jollekin vieraalle hauskin muistosi morsiamesta tai sulhasesta
task.english: Tell one of the guests your funniest memory of the bride or groom

task.finnish: Kerro että pidät taukoa alkoholista ja juo samaan aikaan näkyvästi alkoholijuomaa
task.english: While obviously drinking alcohol, tell people that you're taking a break from alcohol
While another guest can see you, talk to your drink like it was a pet or baby

task.finnish: Kysy joltain vieraalta mitä "brasilialainen vahaus" tarkoittaa
task.english: Ask one of the guests to explain what a "full Brazilian wax" means

task.finnish: Leiki tiputtaneesi piilolinssisi lattialle ja pyydä muita vieraita auttamaan etsinnässä
task.english: Pretend to have dropped your contact lense on the floor and ask other guests to help you find it

task.finnish: Aloita keskustelu neutronien liikeradasta (luulet sen tarkoittavan ruuhkautunutta liikennettä)
task.english: Start a conversation about neutron momentum (you think it means traffic jams)
Tickle one of the guests

task.finnish: Käy kysymässä vierailta mitä salatehtäviä he ovat tehneet (niistä ei saa kertoa)
task.english: Ask around what secret tasks people have completed (people are not supposed to tell)
Dance the twist on the dance floor
Ask the people at your table "Who came up with love?"

task.finnish: Kysy pöytäseurueeltasi kuka on Aleksis Kivi
task.english: Ask the people at your table who Aleksis Kivi is
Offer someone else your spot in a line

task.finnish: Tee jollukulle tietä tai päästä hänet ohitsesi erittäin suurieleisesti
task.english: Move out of someone's way in a very showy or grandiose way
Compliment's someone's perfume

task.finnish: Tee spontaani pyörähdys muiden nähden kävellessäsi jonnekin
task.english: Spin spontaneously in the middle of walking somewhere, so that people can see you
Tell the person next to you that you occasionally work as a moder
High five one of the bridesmaids

task.finnish: Kysy sulhasen siskolta tai veljeltä mistä hän tuntee sulhasen
task.english: Ask the groom's sister or brother where they know the groom from
